Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.json

package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.json
Utilities to handle JSON files
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin
    Infrastructure to integrate services with Shesmu server and olives
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AsJsonNode
    Convert a Shesmu value into a JSON value based on the Shesmu type
    JsonBodyHandler<W>
    Read a JSON response from an HTTP connection and decode it via Jackson
    JsonListBodyHandler<W>
    Read a JSON array response from an HTTP connection and decode it via Jackson into a stream
    JsonParameter<A extends JsonParameterisedAction>
    A parameter definition for a parameter in a JSON object
    JsonPluginFile<T>
    Creates a watched JSON file that will be notified when the file changes on disk and parsed
    PackJsonArray
    Append a Shesmu value onto a JSON array
    PackJsonObject
    Add a Shesmu value into a JSON object
    PackStreaming
    Convert a value to JSON using the streaming interface
    UnpackJson
    Parse a JSON value based on a type
